verbose_text: It binds to specific IGF-1 receptors by autocrine or paracrine, thus promoting the cell proliferation and differentiation, inhibiting the apoptosis, promoting the protein synthesis, etc.; in addition, it has a certain cross-role with insulin receptors XREF_BIBR.
evidence:
It binds to specific IGF-1 receptors by
autocrine or paracrine, thus promoting the cell proliferation
